subject: SSN5752 - order status
description_text:
Hello, I would like to know the status of the order and what your forecast
is for dispatch. Thank you and have a good day.


joana valerio

conversations.body_text: Hi Nelson silva,  I apologize for not responding to you promptly. I see your package has been delivered. Have you received it?

Yes, I have received it.
thank you very much.
But I've already placed a new order because I forgot the base plate.
 SSN6113


service@simsonn.com
Hi Nelson silva,  You're welcome. Thank you for purchasing our product. Should you have any questions in the future, please feel free to contact us. We will address them promptly.
